Text: Get Membership RewardsR Bonus PointsIMAGE IMAGE Its archived You can even access and print your last six months of account statements so record keeping is easier than ever before Its fast Youll be able to view your statement whenever you want instead of waiting for it to arrive in the mail IMAGE Its printable Any time you need a paper copy of your statementfor proof of purchase or any other reasonyou can print it with a simple mouse click Its feefree Theres no charge for OnlineOnly Statements Only some Consumer Cards are eligible to receive the OnlineOnly statement To enroll in OnlineOnly statements Cardmembers must enroll each eligible Card account separately The recipient of this offer has to have at least one Card enrolled in the Membership Rewards program in order to receive the bonus points offer Maximum of Membership Rewards bonus points per Card account when Cardmember enrolls in OnlineOnly statements Receipt and use of points is subject to program terms and conditions Bonus points will be credited to your Membership Rewards account within weeks after signing up This offer expires on Bonus ID PS This email was sent to NRONCOM If you received this email at a different address this email message was forwarded If you do not wish to receive future email offers from American Express please hit the reply button and let us know by typing the word REMOVE and indicate this email address in the subject line Please visit the American Express Privacy Statement at privacy to set review or change preferences regarding the type of emails you want to receive Copyright American Express Company All Rights Reserved
